title: Bug 118780: Set alias for columns in data set but in expression builder, original column names are still displayed when selecting the dataset.
OB: When selecting a dataset in the expression builder, the original column names are displayed instead of the alias names.
EB: In the expression builder, when selecting a dataset, the column names should be displayed as their corresponding alias names instead of the original names.
SR:
1. Open the expression builder. 
2. Select a dataset that has columns with alias names. 
3. Double click on the first column name. 

Expected result: The alias name of the first column should be displayed in the expression builder.

Actual result: The original name of the first column is displayed in the expression builder instead of the alias name.
